title: Basic English Course
description: We will be given the basic idea of ​​English in this course. This course will give a full concept of Tens and teach the essential grammar of English.This course will clear your understanding of basic English

title: Basic Math course
description: This course covers basic math concepts. Here more important topics including L.C.M., H.C.F., Unitary Law, Simplification, Vectors, Geometry are discussed in detail.This course will clear your basic concepts of mathematics

title: Bsc Preparation Course
description: This course is arranged with BCS final preparation. Here are different year questions including Bengali, Numerical, English, History, Current Affairs.And the important things of each topic are arranged separately

title: Spoken English
description: Our Speaking English course teaches you how to speak English fluently. Every day some new words are taught, correct pronunciation of words is taught and every day there are some exercises.There are assignments two days a weekSpeak English in front of everyone

author.name: Md. Ayyub
